entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 19 March 2023
